## Spectral Rank Invariants {visibility="visible"}

:::{style="text-align: center"}

We study _spectral-relaxations_ of <span style="color:orange"> persistent rank invariants </span>  $\beta_p^{\ast}$ and $\mu_p^\ast$ that:

1. Smoothly interpolates _persistent rank function_ $\leftrightarrow$ _Laplacian norms_
2. "Matrix-free" computation in $\approx O(n)$ memory 
3. Admit fast $(1 \pm \epsilon)$ approximation for any $\epsilon > 0$
4. Variety of applications, e.g. featurization, optimization, metric learning
